Aug_transforms

Source: R/image_ops.R
aug_transforms.Rd

Utility func to easily create a list of flip, rotate, zoom, warp, lighting transforms.

aug_transforms(
  mult = 1,
  do_flip = TRUE,
  flip_vert = FALSE,
  max_rotate = 10,
  min_zoom = 1,
  max_zoom = 1.1,
  max_lighting = 0.2,
  max_warp = 0.2,
  p_affine = 0.75,
  p_lighting = 0.75,
  xtra_tfms = NULL,
  size = NULL,
  mode = "bilinear",
  pad_mode = "reflection",
  align_corners = TRUE,
  batch = FALSE,
  min_scale = 1
)

Arguments

mult

mult
do_flip

do_flip
